SELECT soma_article.article_id as articleId, article_writer_id as articleWriterId, article_modifier_id as articleModifierId, article_generation_id as articleGenerationId, article_content as articleContent, article_created_at as articleCreatedAt, article_updated_at as articleUpdatedAt, article_type as articleType, article_status as articleStatus, lecture_teacher_id as lectureTeacherId, lecture_begin_at as lectureBeginAt, lecture_end_at as lectureEndAt
FROM soma.soma_lecture inner join soma.soma_article on soma.soma_lecture.article_id =soma.soma_article.article_id where soma_article.article_id = #{lecture_id} ORDER BY soma_article.article_id DESC
